data.enText: the amount of confidence and enthusiasm, etc. that a person or a group has at a particular time

data.chText: 鼓舞 / 提高士气；增强信心

data.enText: Morale amongst the players is very high at the moment.
Staff are suffering from low morale.

simple_means.memory_skill: mor 道德 + ale →〔一群人〕有道德精神 → 士气

tr: the spirit of a group that makes the members want the group to succeed
a state of individual psychological well-being based upon a sense of confidence and usefulness and purpose

value.def: Morale is the amount of confidence and cheerfulness that a group of people have.

example.ex: Many pilots are suffering from low morale...
example.tran: 很多飞行员目前士气低落。

example.ex: They hope to boost the morale of their troops.
example.tran: 他们希望提升部队的士气。

trans: 鼓舞士气的事物;振奋精神的事情

partsOfSpeech.dec: de 非 + moral 道德 + ize 使… → 使没有士气 → 使士气消沉
mor 道德 + al …的 → 道德的
mor 道德 + ale →〔一群人〕有道德精神 → 士气
mor 道德 + es → 道德观念；风俗
